name: Martian Rover Simulator
description:
You are a rover on a very important mission on Mars. Imagine photographing a surface, recording wind noise or simply exploring the endless desert. Humanity needs your research, hurry to hit the road!

Controls:
  • W,A,S,D — Movement
  • ESC — pause menu: you can restart or exit game

This game was made for educational purposes for the first experience with the engine.

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
